Detailed Description

ObitFullBeam class function definitions.

This class is derived from the Obit base class.

ObitFullBeam Class to generate full beam corrections from beam images An ObitFullBeam takes images or (hyper)cubes of a primary beam in a given Stokes parameter and assists in image plane corrections

Function Documentation

Public: Get beam value.

PAngle Parallactic Angle (deg)

odouble  dDec,
ofloat  PAngle,
olong  plane,
ObitErr *  err
) 
 

Public: Get beam value providing interpolator.

Locks in->thread for multithreading Use this routine for best multi-threaded performance.

Parameters:
in Object to interpolate
interp Interpolator
dRA Right Ascension offset desired (deg) @ std. equinox
dDec Declination offset (deg) desired @ std. equinox
PAngle Parallactic Angle (deg)
plane Image plane 0-rel (frequency) to use Can be obtained from ObitFullBeamFindPlane
err Obit error stack object.
Returns:
interpolated beam value - may be fblank
